description.value:
Bolstered by magical power, the target grows to size Large. Its equipment grows with it but returns to natural size if removed. The creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy]{Clumsy 1}. Its reach increases by 5 feet (or by 10 feet if it started out Tiny), and it gains a +2 status bonus to melee damage. This spell has no effect on a Large or larger creature.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Enlarge]

Heightened (4th) The creature instead grows to size Huge. The status bonus to melee damage is +4 and the creature's reach increases by 10 feet (or 15 feet if the creature started out Tiny). The spell has no effect on a Huge or larger creature. @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spell-effects.Item.Spell Effect: Enlarge (Heightened 4th)]

Heightened (6th) Choose either the 2nd-rank or 4th-rank version of this spell and apply its effects to 10 willing creatures.

Cloaked in illusion, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Invisible]. This makes it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Undetected] to all creatures, though the creatures can attempt to find the target, making it @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Hidden] to them instead. If the target uses a hostile action, the spell ends after that hostile action is completed.

Heightened (4th) The spell lasts 1 minute, but it doesn't end if the target uses a hostile action.

Activate A Strike

Alchemist's fire is a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. Alchemist's fire deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

This flask filled with corrosive acid deals 1 acid damage, 3d6 persistent acid damage, and 3 acid splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.
These blades come in a variety of shapes and styles, but they are typically 2 feet long.

Though referred to as a breastplate, this type of armor consists of several pieces of plate or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Half Plate] armor that protect the torso, chest, neck, and sometimes the hips and lower legs. It strategically grants some of the protection of plate while allowing greater flexibility and speed.
This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.

This silver signet ring changes to match the insignia of a lord or organization you serve (or your own face, if you serve no one else). It grants you a +3 item bonus to Diplomacy checks and lets you cast @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Message] as an arcane innate spell at will.

Activate 1 minute (envision)

Frequency once per day

Effect The ring casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Animal Messenger] to your specification. The animal is a magical creature that springs from the ring, and its appearance suits the iconography or heraldry of the lord or organization represented by the ring.

Activate 3 command

Frequency once per hour

Effect The ring casts @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Sending] to your specifications.

Activate A Interact

An antidote protects you against toxins. Upon drinking an antidote, you gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against poisons for 6 hours, and when you drink the antidote, you can immediately attempt a saving throw against one poison of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, the poison is neutralized.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Antidote (Major)]

Activate A Interact

Elixirs of life accelerate a living creature''s natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain [[/r (7d6+18)[healing]]]{7d6+18 Hit Points} and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Elixir of Life (Greater)]

This bitter draught opens your mind to the potential of the written word. For the listed duration after drinking this elixir, you can understand any words you read, so long as they are written in a common language. This elixir doesn't automatically allow you to understand codes or extremely esoteric passages-you still need to attempt a skill check to Decipher Writing. The duration is 10 minutes.
Splash 10 Feet
Splash 10 Feet

Qormintur carries the following infused items: 6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Acid Flask (Greater)]{Greater Acid Flasks}, 6 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Alchemist's Fire (Greater)]{Greater Alchemist's Fires}, 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Antidote (Major)]{Major Antidotes}, and 2 @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Elixir of Life (Greater)]{Greater Elixirs of Life}.

These items last for 24 hours, or until the next time Qormintur makes her daily preparations.

items.name: +2 Status to All Saves vs. Magical Effects

description.value: Qormintur automatically disbelieves all illusions of 8th level or lower.
When Qormintur rolls a success on a Fortitude save, she gets a critical success instead.
@Localize[PF2E.NPC.Abilities.Glossary.LightBlindness]
When throwing an alchemical bomb with the splash trait, Qormintur can choose to deal splash damage to her primary target only, rather than dealing the usual splash damage.

Qormintur reminds others of the punishments Shraens mete out for failure. Qormintur and all allies within 60 feet of her gain a +1 status bonus to attack rolls and damage rolls until the end of Qormintur's next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.bestiary-effects.Item.Effect: Dire Warning]
Qormintur Interacts to draw an alchemical bomb, then Strikes with it.

Requirements Qormintur is wielding a piercing or slashing weapon and has a free hand

Cost 1 batch of infused reagents

Effect Qormintur applies reagents to the weapon. The weapon deals an additional @Damage[2d10[poison]] damage for 1 minute.

Qormintur's range increment for bombs is 60 feet. She reduces any circumstance bonus to the target's AC from cover by 1, and she automatically succeeds at the flat check when she targets a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Concealed] creature.

allSaves.value: +2 status to all saves vs. magical effects

publication.title: Pathfinder #155: Lord of the Black Sands
